response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that I believe could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This exclusive item carries a unique value of $1,200,000 to me, reflecting its importance and the resources invested in its creation. My proposal is to offer it to you at a competitive price of $1,100,000, aiming to provide you with a valuable asset at a favorable cost.

Please consider this offer carefully, keeping in mind the potential benefits and opportunities that come with owning such a product. If you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out to me. I am here to assist you throughout the process.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
